name: quintuple
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to increase by five times, or to increase something by five times: Since 2010, the company's revenue has quintupled. They militarized the country by quintupling the size of its armed forces.

affecting or involving five different things or parts of something: He had a quintuple heart bypass operation. a quintuple murder case
